thread.title: Police search for answers in Oregon college rampage PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Police search for answers in Oregon college rampage | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Police search for answers in Oregon college rampage PBS NewsHour
text: Federal authorities say that the shooter who killed nine people at Umpqua Community College in Oregon had body armor and six guns with him, and seven more guns found at his apartment. Neighbors describe the gunman, who died in a shootout with police, as reclusive. Special correspondent Cat Wise reports on how the Roseburg community is mourning.
